Privacy Statement
The first message that is sent to the user. It introduces your organization and the service you provide through this bot.
A menu asking the user to choose between a set of options. This message automatically follows the Greeting message. 9 cannot be used as an option in the main menu.
An optional menu asking the user to choose from a set of options. When a user replies with one of the options, the bot can send a report or direct them to another bot message.
The message asking the user to submit content for a fact-check.
The confirmation sent to the user after a valid query from the user has been received.
Present the value of your newsletter and collect opt-ins. All users who opt-in will automatically receive the newsletter you send.
Please complete the steps below to send a weekly newsletter:
1. Compose your newsletter
2. Select a day and time of the week

This message will be sent to users if, after a conversation is initiated, they do not select either option: receive a resource or submit content to verify. This message will also be sent to users who submitted content without waiting for the query prompt.
The message sent if the user response to a menu is not a valid menu scenario.
The message sent to the user when status of a report has changed. The report must be completed for this message to be sent.
An automatic message sent to the user when they have sent a file that is not supported by Check.
This message is sent to any user that has sent a message to the tipline when the Check Message bot is set to inactive.
By default, the following Privacy Statement is available to all users. When replacing it with a custom one, you must do so for each language your bot is active in.
The option '9' must be referenced for users to access the Privacy Statement on the Main menu.
Privacy Statement content. Edit the text below, or replace it with custom content.

The following statement and option will be automatically added at the end of this message: 'We will never share your personally identifiable information. Reply 9 to read our Privacy and Purpose statement'.
The default Privacy Statement can be replaced with a custom one under the option 'Privacy Statement' on this page.
